channel.title: Adding The Vengeance Gfx and Model!
channel.description:
You must have done yaranova's TuT on how to add gfx's to a client on rune~server link : http://www.rune~server.org/showthread.php?t=43936&highlight=veng (replace the ~ with -)
Step1:Download the model from here [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=0R8GMHI9]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=0R8GMHI9[/url],Click save to disk and then go to your desktop and drag the zip into your models folder.
Step2:Run your client and type: add model 1828 , after that it will say model added sucesfully.Now close down the client and the server and compile both of them.
Step3:Open up your class 23.java and add this case under another one :
[code]case 642: /* gfx ID veng */ originalDataID = 342; // you can change this , this id makes it spin ;) gfx.anInt405 = 1828; /* Model ID 16828*/ break;[/code] After you are done that look for int newSpotAnimCount = ; in your class23 (on top of the case 642) and add a number on it so if it was int newSpotAnimCount = 1; change it to int newSpotAnimCount = 2;.
Step4:Save your class23.java and compile here is the command if you want to test it out:
[code]if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("veng")) { stillgfxz(642, absY, absX, 0, 10); //makes veng gfx appear }[/code]
Video Here: http://img532.imageshack.us/flvplayer.swf?f=Tvengeancejp2

item.title: Adding The Vengeance Gfx and Model!
item.dc:creator: @i_duh_loot i duh loot
item.description:
@i_duh_loot wrote:

[quote=“sheeba, post:14, topic:187595”]umm i tried adding it where it says and i tried 3 time in diff places also and i get this wuts wrong?

[/quote]

That means you already had that case in you client, now you have 2, take 1 away and it will compile nicely.

Read full topic

item.title: Adding The Vengeance Gfx and Model!
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“D D 3, post:7, topic:187595”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=250214.msg2099151#msg2099151 date=1205104203]
like this hasn’t been done one thousand times, ok you’ve done well bravo but this is old news its been knocking around for weeks and possibly months now so please god can’t people stop posting about bloody vengeance
[/quote]That was a pathetic remark.Not many people have started client coding and all have been coding servers it is a tutorial.Click the search button and look for vengeance you will see not many client side tutorials.Is your post supposed to hurt me or make me remove this TuT certainly not coming from someone with this in there sig “Mrs.Silabsoft is queen on this forum” ROFL.[/quote]
TBH she is she has done more for this forum than anyone else also it wasn’t meant to hurt, disgrace or otherwise insult you it was merely a fact that poeple have been doing this for ages now and if they haven’t figure it out themselves then they should really not be doing this should they? because it doesn’t take alot of energy or effort to work this out for gods sake. Also i am going to support Mrs Silabsoft because there are tonnes of people who are anti silabsoft and if it wern’t for her half those people would still be running 377 clients with old models

Read full topic
